actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA, OMB.
Committee on Veterans received executive comment from VA.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs may furnish outpatient dental services and treatment for non-service-connected disability to any war veteran who has a service-connected disability of 50 per centum or more.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to furnish outpatient dental services to veterans with a service-connected disability rating of 50 percent or more.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs may furnish outpatient dental services and treatment for non-service-connected disability to any war veteran who has a service-connected disability of 50 per centum or more.
